title: Great smart glasses
review: Love the Ray-Ban Meta glasses! Camera quality is impressive and battery life lasts all day. The design is sleek and comfortable to wear.

title: Mixed feelings
review: The AI assistant is cool but connectivity issues are frustrating. Had to reset multiple times. Price is a bit high for the experience.

title: Returning them
review: Terrible. Privacy concerns with the LED light, and the audio is audible to everyone around. Not worth the price. Returning.

title: Perfect for travel
review: Incredible product! Hands-free photos on vacation were amazing. Meta AI voice control works great. Best purchase of the year.

title: Solid but room for improvement
review: Good design and comfortable fit. Battery could be better - drains fast with camera use. Camera quality is decent for quick captures.
